878940.name: Collective: the Community Created Card Game
878940.description:
Collective is the first competitive strategy card game where players have direct control over the effect, appearance, and balance of all the cards in the game. Craft any card you can imagine using the Card Creator. Once you're happy with it, post the card to our Subreddit. Each week the top 10 posts are added to the game permanently, for everyone to play with.

Features

  • Create the Game You Want To Play. Players create all the cards and control the game's balance.
  • No Packs, No Lootboxes. Collective is free-to-play. If you choose to spend money, you'll always know exactly what you're getting.
  • Play as a Hero. Build your deck around a Hero and reap unique benefits throughout each game. Inspired by popular MOBAS, Heroes gain experience throughout each match and grant a powerful effect each time they level up.
  • Vote In Game. After each game or using Voting Tickets, you can vote on a card in the running to be added at the end of the week.
  • Card Blueprints. Unlock a card blueprint once, and you have access to unlimited copies of the card forever. No more fretting over which cards to dust!
  • Simultaneous Turns. Out-think and out-plan your opponent on your way to victory, and players spend less time waiting around!
  • Sentinels of Wanderstar. A singleplayer roguelite mode where you build your deck as you go along. You'll even get to play with cards that aren't in the game yet!
878940.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
